about_the_game:
Hope a potato story is a flash inspired game of the 2000s where you take control of a tiny potato in a question to slow down a virus like curse that is slowly is threatening your people and the potato kingdoms using your trusty controllable dash and weapons you acquire to get the job done or at least thin their numbers

The idea of this game is that the community that plays it can help on its development and future Updates the game is what the community and the dev team think it is best every voice matters and the team wants to make the game as enjoyable as possible

The game in full release will feature more than 100 perks more than 10 different weapons Upgrades for set weapons and will be adding more with time and help from the community

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Nice, simple and cute top down shooter action. Save the kingdom from the all consuming curse you are not the first to try and will not be the last but maybe you can find something to end this endless cycle ?
